nameGenerator.title: Name Generator
nameGenerator.subtitle: Generate creative business, brand, product or personal names with our easy-to-use generator.

form.description: Enter keywords or choose an industry to generate name suggestions

results.title: Generated Names
results.description: Click the heart icon to save your favorites or copy icon to copy to clipboard.
results.empty: Generate some names to see results here.
results.favoritesDescription: Your saved names will appear here.
results.noResults: No names generated yet. Fill in the form and click Generate.
results.noFavorites: No favorite names saved yet. Click the heart icon on names you like.

errors.noInput: Please enter keywords or select an industry

tips.title: Name Selection Tips
tips.tip1: Choose short, memorable names that are easy to pronounce
tips.tip2: Consider the meaning and connotations of your name
tips.tip3: Check domain availability for your chosen name
tips.tip4: Test the name with your target audience

cta.readyToIncrease: Ready to increase your online business efficiency?
cta.contactUs: Contact us today and discover how our web solutions can help your company succeed online.

domainCreator.pageDescription: Create the perfect domain name for your website or business with our domain name creator.
domainCreator.title: Domain Name Creator
domainCreator.subtitle: Generate creative and available domain names for your website or business.

form.description: Enter keywords or choose an industry to generate domain suggestions

errors.noInput: Enter keywords or select an industry

tips.title: Domain Selection Tips
tips.tip1: Choose short, easy to remember domain names
tips.tip2: Avoid hyphens and numbers which can be difficult to communicate verbally
tips.tip3: Check domain availability before making a decision
tips.tip4: Consider purchasing different extension variants (.com, .org, etc.) for brand protection
tips.tip5: Make sure the domain name does not infringe on trademarks
tips.tip6: Think about keywords related to your industry for better SEO
tips.conclusion: After selecting the perfect domain name, you can register it with domain registrars or contact us to help you with the entire website creation process.

footer.about: We provide comprehensive marketing solutions that help companies achieve real results and gain a competitive advantage.
footer.newsletterDescription: Subscribe to our newsletter and stay up to date with the latest marketing trends.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: IDZTECH ("we", "us", "our") respects the privacy of visitors to our website https://idztech.pl ("Site"). This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and protect information that you may provide to us when using our Site.
introduction.agreement: By using our Site, you consent to the practices described in this Privacy Policy. If you do not agree with any point in this policy, please stop using our Site.

contact.title: Contact Information
contact.content: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy or our data practices, please contact us:

dataCollection.title: Information We Collect
dataCollection.intro: We may collect the following types of information:

personal.title: Personal Information:
personal.content: Name, email address, phone number and other data that you voluntarily provide to us through contact or registration forms.

technical.title: Technical Data:
technical.content: IP address, browser type and version, time zone settings, browser plugin types and versions, operating system and platform, and other technologies used on the devices you use to access our Site.

dataUsage.title: How We Use Your Information
dataUsage.intro: We use the information collected to:
dataUsage.purpose1: Provide, operate, and improve our Site
dataUsage.purpose3: Respond to user inquiries or requests
dataUsage.purpose4: Send information and updates regarding our services (if the user consents)
dataUsage.purpose5: Analyze usage trends and Site performance

cookies.title: Cookies
cookies.description: Our Site uses cookies, which are small text files placed on your device to recognize your browser. Cookies help us analyze traffic on the site, customize our Site to user needs, and track basic user information.
cookies.settings: You can configure your browser to refuse all or some cookies or to notify you when cookies are being placed. However, if you disable cookies, some features of our Site may not function properly.

analytics.title: Analytics Tools
analytics.content: We use analytics tools, such as Google Analytics, to understand how users interact with our Site. These tools may use cookies and other technologies to collect and analyze information about your use of the Site. Information generated by these tools about your use of our Site is transmitted to analytics service providers and stored on their servers.

sharing.title: Sharing Information
sharing.content: We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer your personal data to third parties, except for trusted third parties who help us operate our Site, provided that these parties agree to keep this information confidential.

security.title: Data Security
security.content: We have implemented appropriate security measures to protect your personal data from loss, misuse, unauthorized access, disclosure, alteration, or destruction.

rights.title: User Rights
rights.intro: Under applicable data protection laws, you may have the right to:
rights.right4: Object to processing of your personal data
rights.right5: Restrict processing of your personal data
rights.howTo: To exercise these rights, please contact us using the contact information provided above.

changes.title: Changes to the Privacy Policy
changes.content: We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. Any changes will be published on this page with a new update date. We recommend periodically checking this Privacy Policy to keep track of any changes.

consent.title: Consent
consent.content: By using our Site, you consent to the terms of this Privacy Policy.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: These Terms of Use constitute an agreement between you and IDZTECH ("we", "us", "our") regarding your use of our website https://idztech.pl ("Site") and the services we provide. Please read these Terms of Use carefully before accessing or using our Site.

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By accessing or using our Site, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Use. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use our Site.

services.title: Services Description
services.content: IDZTECH offers web development, e-commerce development, SEO services, and other digital marketing solutions. The scope and details of specific services will be determined in individual agreements with clients.

intellectualProperty.title: Intellectual Property
intellectualProperty.content: All content on this Site, including text, graphics, logos, images, audio, video, and software, is the property of IDZTECH or its content suppliers and is protected by copyright and intellectual property laws. You may not use, reproduce, distribute, modify, or create derivative works from any content on our Site without our prior written consent.

userContent.title: User Content
userContent.content: By submitting content to our Site (including but not limited to comments, feedback, or suggestions), you grant IDZTECH a non-exclusive, royalty-free, perpetual, and worldwide license to use, reproduce, modify, adapt, publish, translate, and distribute such content in any media formats and through any media channels.

prohibited.title: Prohibited Activities
prohibited.intro: When using our Site, you agree not to:
prohibited.item1: Violate any applicable laws or regulations
prohibited.item2: Infringe upon the rights of others
prohibited.item3: Use our Site to distribute spam, malware, or other harmful content
prohibited.item4: Attempt to interfere with the proper functioning of our Site
prohibited.item5: Collect or harvest user data without permission

liability.title: Limitation of Liability
liability.content: IDZTECH shall not be liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages resulting from your access to or use of, or inability to access or use, our Site or any content thereon. Our Site is provided on an "as is" and "as available" basis without any warranties of any kind.

termination.title: Termination
termination.content: We may terminate or suspend your access to our Site immediately, without prior notice or liability, for any reason, including breach of these Terms of Use. Upon termination, your right to use our Site will cease immediately.

changes.title: Changes to Terms
changes.content: We reserve the right to modify or replace these Terms of Use at any time. It is your responsibility to check these Terms of Use periodically for changes. Your continued use of our Site after any changes to these Terms of Use constitutes your acceptance of the new terms.

governingLaw.title: Governing Law
governingLaw.content: These Terms of Use shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of Poland, without regard to its conflict of law provisions.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions about these Terms of Use, please contact us at patryk.idzikowski@idztech.pl.
